channel.title: How to get Vista on a Windows Xp Computer
channel.description:
[u][b]How To Get Vista![/b][/u]
1. Minimize everything that is maximized or whatever. 2. Right-Click Your Mouse and go to "Properties" 3. Go to "Appearance" and find "Windows and buttons:" 4. There is Vista, Vista Inspirat 2 (Best One), Windows Classic Style, and Windows Xp
[IMG]http://i884.photobucket.com/albums/ac47/tonyboloney2/capture3-1.jpg[/img]

item.title: How to get Vista on a Windows Xp Computer
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:2, topic:321046”]Firstly, that is a Vista THEME, not Vista itself. Secondly, you don’t get the vista theme in Windows XP unless you download it.

This topic is pointless.[/quote]

He is correct, you have to download it.

It doesn’t just come with your computer.

Read full topic

item.title: How to get Vista on a Windows Xp Computer
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Tony-Scape Owner Tony-Scape
item.description:
@Owner_Tony-Scape wrote:

How To
Get Vista!

  1. Minimize everything that is maximized or whatever.
  2. Right-Click Your Mouse and go to “Properties”
  3. Go to “Appearance” and find “Windows and buttons:”
  4. There is Vista, Vista Inspirat 2 (Best One), Windows Classic Style, and Windows Xp
